message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $9,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9,200 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, I'm happy to keep negotiating, but I can't go any lower than $9,400.  I'm confident this is a fair price for both of us. Let's make this deal happen.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering its value to me.
